q-start.text: Search your feelings. Why are you traveling?

want-vacation.text: Vacation? Now that's a word I haven't heard in a long time.

want-teleportation.text: I just want to teleport off this rock.

q-break.text: What could you use a break from?

break-faces.text: The same faces at the cantina

choice-no.text: No, most of my friends have moved away.

choice-yes.text: Yes, I can't stand pathetic life forms.

q-pouting.text: Aw, QQ. Stop pouting and go find them!

friends-party.text: A ton of party animals. Mos Eisley is old news.

friends-tight.text: Tight-knit. I'd do anything for them.

q-spend.text: How do you spend your time together?

q-anger.text: Beware. Anger, fear, aggression. The Dark Side are they.

q-sounds.text: Sounds like you need to commune with nature.

sounds-ok.text: OK but I'm not sleeping outside, right?

q-work.text: What kind of work are you in?

q-inspired.text: What are you more inspired by?

inpired-posters.text: Posters with eagles and inspirational quotes

q-motto.text: Which motto do you live by?

motto-religions.text: Hokey religions are no match for a good blaster at your side.

q-painting.text: Whose painting would you frame on your wall?

q-canttravel.text: What's one thing you can't travel without?

q-business.text: Who would you never do business with?

q-longdistance.text: Are you willing to travel far?

midichlorian-less.text: DGAF! No mystical energy field controls my destiny.

q-searching.text: Are you searching for something or hiding from something?

foradventure-adv.text: Adventure. Excitement. A Jedi craves not these things.

q-bluemilk.text: How do you like your blue milk?

fromwhat-slimy.text: A slimy piece of worm-ridden filth

q-gungans.text: Gungans no liking hot, dry weather.

whathappened-remains.text: I came home to the charred remains of my relatives.

q-relieved.text: ...but weren't you mildly relieved it meant you finally got to fly away?

relieved-no.text: No, I love living in a remote desert

q-burned.text: Before your house burned down, what was your favorite toy as a kid?

q-glutton.text: Are you a glutton for pain?

q-fate.text: Which fate would you rather be dealt?

q-future.text: True or false? Impossible to see, the future is.

q-sithbastard.text: No vacation can heal that, you Sith bastard.

q-lovemoney.text: If money is what you love, then that's what you'll receive.

q-deathwish.text: Do you have a death wish?

q-howdie.text: How do you want to die?

gambling-yes.text: Yes, never tell me the odds.

q-rethink.text: You may want to rethink your life choices.

rethink-mind.text: Your Jedi mind tricks don't work on me.

q-clear.text: Clear your mind you must. How do you unwind?

q-relationship.text: Are you in a serious relationship?

relationship-no.text: No, she died giving birth to twins.

relationship-idk.text: I don't know... You think a princess and a guy like me...

q-badfeeling.text: I have a bad feeling about this.

q-finish.text: Finish the phrase: 'Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to...'

q-kisssibling.text: Would you kiss your sibling to make them jealous?

q-prisoner.text: The love of your life has been taken prisoner. Do you risk your life to save theirs?

q-adventure.text: Sounds like you're up for an adventure.

adventure-behind.text: Those days are long behind us.

dest-malastare.title: Malastare
dest-malastare.desc: Podracing is very fast and very dangerous, but if you're up for it, there's no place better to attempt it than on Malastare. The planet hosts regular tournaments like the Malastare 100 and the Dug Derby. The native Dugs aren't the friendliest of beings, but if you've got the racing chops, they'll help you navigate the competition circuit. If you can make it on Malastare, you can make it anywhere.

dest-ryloth.title: Ryloth
dest-ryloth.desc: A long-time major exporter of medicinal products, Ryloth doubles as a safari destination thanks to its incredible biodiversity. Your Twi'lek guides will take you across lush valleys, thriving jungles, and breathtaking volcanoes. Tourists come from all over the galaxy to see the beautiful Floating Rock Gardens, a unique and ever-shifting geological phenomenon with all the colors of the rainbow that has dazzled visitors for generations.

dest-naboo.title: Naboo
dest-naboo.desc: Naboo isn't just a beautiful planet with an undersea society of Gungans. It's also full of beautiful ruins and museums dedicated to Outer Rim history. Learn about long-vanished species and political revolutions that changed the course of galactic affairs. Visit the capital city of Theed and learn about the planet's own stormy past, from the earliest days of human-Gungan interaction to the troubling events of Queen Amidala's reign that sparked the Clone Wars.

dest-moncala.title: Mon cala (DAC)
dest-moncala.desc: Mon Cala, best known as the home of the gregarious species of the same name, is one of the galaxy's most beautiful SCUBA diving destinations. Its crystal-clear oceans are home to a dizzying array of species, and your Mon Calamari guide will explain how every one of them fits into the planet's tumultuous history. Time your adventure right, and you just might spot a majestic whaladon roaming the ocean planet's tranquil waters.

dest-coruscant.title: Coruscant
dest-coruscant.desc: Coruscant has developed into an ecumenopolis, with a total of 5,127 levels of city built up from the crust. This planet is a 12-layer cake of urban sprawl, ranging from dingy underworld druggies to high-brow business people. Think of New York, Las Vegas, Hong Kong, and Tokyo all rolled into one. Whatever your imagination can conceive, you can do it in Coruscant, but it’s not going to be cheap!

dest-ilum.title: Ilum
dest-ilum.desc: If you're the prospecting type, consider a visit to icy Ilum in search of the rare kyber crystals. The legendary Jedi Knights power their lightsabers with these crystals, but you don't have to sense the Force yourself to make use of one. Their immense power means they can last a lifetime in ordinary applications like home appliances, and their rarity means they'll fetch a high price in any galactic marketplace.

dest-jakku.title: Jakku
dest-jakku.desc: If you're an explorer at heart, you'll love the eerie shipwrecks on Jakku. They're begging to be explored and scavenged! Jakku is made up of vast, dry deserts that conceal countless valuable treasures. The hard part is finding them. The most important law on Jakku is "finders keepers," so if you're clever and fast enough, you might bring home more than a cheesy hologram souvenir from this vacation.

dest-endor.title: Endor
dest-endor.desc: If you love a good camping trip, Endor is where you want to be. The native Ewoks have become more accustomed to visitors ever since the Battle of Endor thrust their world into the galactic spotlight. Although their cuisine is still a bit unusual, they are happy to take tourists on adventures through the woods. Galactic law allows hunting, but consult with your Ewok guides before you try to capture something like a boar-wolf.

dest-mustafar.title: Mustafar
dest-mustafar.desc: A fiery volcanic world where lava is mined like a precious natural resource. Don't let its drab mining outposts fool you–Mustafar offers some of the hottest thrills in the Outer Rim. The locals' favorite sport is lava-racing but it is not for the faint of heart. Be careful, though: you don't want to be out racing when a storm blows in. As you can imagine, lava storms are very dangerous events.

dest-vacation.title: No need
dest-vacation.desc: You don't need A vacation. The force will set you free.

dest-thisisnot.title: Not for you
dest-thisisnot.desc: This is not the flowchart you're looking for.

dest-notry.title: Do or do not
dest-notry.desc: Do or do not; there is no try.
